TITANS.name: Argus, the Emerald Star
TITANS.text: [x]Titan Minions to the left of this have Rush, and ones to the right have Lifesteal.
TITANS.flavor: Once a proud titan, Argus was fated to meet a darker end. Sargeras and his demons would later corrupt and shatter Argus to use his power for themselves.

TITANS.name: Containment Unit
TITANS.text: [x]Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon a random 8-Cost minion.
TITANS.flavor: Surprisingly ticklish.

TITANS.name: Elemental Inspiration
TITANS.text: [x]Summon a 4/5 Vortex with a random bonus effect for each spell school you have cast this game.@ (@)
TITANS.flavor: No Hero Power required.

TITANS.name: Mythical Terror
TITANS.text: [x]Lifesteal At the end of your turn, force all enemy minions to attack this.
TITANS.flavor: You cannot pet the Terror in Hearthstone.

TITANS.name: Prison of Yogg-Saron
TITANS.text: [x]Choose a character. Cast 4 random spells (targeting it if possible).
TITANS.flavor:
"We've finally captured Yogg-Saron! How should we keep him contained?"
"How about... an open pit... right below us... with four loose chains?"
"PERFECT!"
TITANS.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the starter quests.
TITANS.howToGetGold: Earnable after purchasing the TITANS Tavern Pass.

TITANS.name: Thorignir Drake
TITANS.text: [x]Rush Whenever this attacks, summon two 3/1 Whelps to attack the target first.
TITANS.flavor: Throwing your children at enemies qualifies you for Worst Mother of the Year.

TITANS.name: Trial by Fire
TITANS.text: [x]Summon five 1/1 Val'kyr with Rush. When one dies, give the others +1/+1.
TITANS.flavor: Well, in ya go.

TITANS.name: Tyr
TITANS.text: Battlecry: Resurrect a 2, 3, and 4-Attack Paladin minion.
TITANS.flavor: Brought me back to life, S Tyr card.

TITANS.name: Cultivation
TITANS.text:
Give your minions +2/+2. Costs (1) less
for each Treant you've summoned this game.
TITANS.flavor: Calling this an 8 mana card is missing the forest for the trees.

TITANS.name: Freya, Keeper of Nature
TITANS.text: [x]Choose One - Duplicate your hand; or Summon copies of all other friendly minions.
TITANS.flavor:
Good things come in pairs.
Good things come in pairs.

TITANS.name: Hodir, Father of Giants
TITANS.text: Battlecry: Set the stats of the next three minions you play to 8/8.
TITANS.flavor: Giant ladies, this one's a Keeper.

TITANS.name: Kologarn
TITANS.text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, put it in your hand. Deathrattle: Move any in your __hand to your opponent's.
TITANS.flavor: "So am I just supposed to stand here forever, or...?"

TITANS.name: Odyn, Prime Designate
TITANS.text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after your hero gains Armor, they gain that much Attack for that turn.
TITANS.flavor: The best offense is a good defense. 30 defense to be exact.

TITANS.name: Shapeless Constellation
TITANS.text: Battlecry: Transform into an 8/8 copy of a random minion in your hand.
TITANS.flavor: Galaxy Brain.

TITANS.name: Son of Hodir
TITANS.text: Battlecry: Shuffle four 8/8 Giants into your deck that are summoned when drawn.
TITANS.flavor: You look dehydrated, drink some water! Come on, chug! Chug! Chug! Chug!

TITANS.name: Storm Giant
TITANS.text: Taunt Forge: Costs (2) less. Can be Forged endlessly.
TITANS.flavor: Storm Giant, Frost Giant, Molten Giant... I want Fair-weather and Sunshine Giant!

TITANS.name: The Primus
TITANS.text: Titan After this uses an ability, Discover a card with that Rune.
TITANS.flavor: As there is a Pantheon of titans, so is there also a Pantheon of Death, comprised of powerful rulers in the Shadowlands.

TITANS.name: Imprisoned Horror
TITANS.text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
damage you've taken on
your turns this game.
TITANS.flavor: Prison changed Jeff.
TITANS.howToGetSignature: Earnable after purchasing the TITANS Tavern Pass.

TITANS.name: Sargeras, the Destroyer
TITANS.text: [x]Titan Battlecry: Open a portal that summons two 3/2 Imps each turn.
TITANS.flavor: Formerly the Defender of the Pantheon, he became disillusioned by his mission and formed the Burning Legion to destroy all life within the universe.

TITANS.name: Eonar, the Life-Binder
TITANS.text: [x]Titan After this uses an ability, summon a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
TITANS.flavor: Protector of all living things, she once saved the nascent world-soul of Azeroth from annihilation. It seems mercy was her greatest wisdom.

TITANS.name: Chained Guardian
TITANS.text: [x]Rush, Reborn Costs (1) less for each Plague shuffled into the _enemy deck this game.
TITANS.flavor: Eternally jealous of the Unchained Gladiator.
